caption.p: Anomalies of climatic factors during 2071–2099 relative to 1981–2010 under RCP8.5 and their partial correlation coefficients with forest NPP in China. ( a, b) temperature. ( c, d) precipitation. ( e, f) aridity index. Note that black checkmarks indicate statistical significance (p < 0.05). The figure was generated using ArcGIS 10.1 software ( http://www.esri.com/).
